title: Mopro: Make Client-side Proving on Mobile Easy
description:
Mopro is a toolkit for ZK app development on mobile. Mopro makes client-side proving on mobile simple. Mopro aims to connect different adapters with different platforms. In this talk, we will share:
- How to use Mopro to develop your own ZK mobile app.
- What is the current development progress, including the current supported proving systems, supported platforms, and mobile GPU exploration results. 
- Moreover, we will share the challenges that Mopro faces and our future roadmap.
